translation.en: Lookie here.
My day is made. [laughs]
I didn't even finish breakfast and I get to kill me a stinkin' Injun.
translation.es: Ni siquiera he desayunado y ya puedo matar a un indio.

translation.en: Injun?
I just dress like this so's I don't get scalped out on the prairie.
translation.es: Me visto así para despistar al enemigo en la planicie.

translation.en: Oh, well, that's a convincing outfit.
Yeah, you can't be too safe out there...
with all of them savages runnin' around.
So, what can I do you for?
Need some flour. Five sacks.
And a carrot with peanut butter on it.
translation.es: Y una zanahoria con mantequilla de maní.

translation.en: Now, what's that gonna run me?
Well, sack of flour's 45 cents.
translation.es: El saco de harina cuesta 45 centavos.

translation.en: So, five sacks...
Wanna get back to me on that?
Yeah, look...
Now, the flour's in the basement.
translation.es: La harina está en el sótano.

translation.en: You can fetch it yourself.
Much obliged.
Well, lookie what we got here.
Sweet piece of red prairie meat out all by her lonesome.
translation.es: Un dulce trozo de carne roja de la planicie, totalmente sola.

translation.en: -What do you make of that, Nelly? -Oh, I think she's waiting on you, Will.
translation.es: - ¿Qué opinas, Nelly? - Creo que te espera, Will.

translation.en: [Nelly Patch] Go on, get on it. [man 1] It's on now.
[man 2] Yeah. [Nelly Patch] Go get her, Will.
[Nelly Patch] Here we go.
Now, you must be wondering why five badass hombres with perfect jawlines...
translation.es: Te preguntarás por qué cinco hombres tremendos con perfiles perfectos...

translation.en: all sport the same stylish eye patch.
translation.es: ...tienen un parche elegante en el ojo.

translation.en: Not my business.
[laughs] We all carved our eyeballs out our skull
translation.es: Todos nos sacamos el ojo del cráneo

translation.en: to show how devoted we are to this gang.
translation.es: para demostrar nuestra devoción por esta pandilla.

translation.en: We the Left-Eye Boys!
You got real pretty eyes, miss.
You reckon we can, I don't know, borrow one?
-[screaming] -Can we borrow one?
Now, is that a proper question to ask a lady?
translation.es: ¿Es una pregunta decente para una dama?

translation.en: Who are you, slick? The boyfriend?
Soon to be the husband.
Oh, wait a minute! That's a white boy under that getup.
translation.es: ¡Un momento! Hay un hombre blanco bajo ese atuendo.

translation.en: That's a white boy? Oh, shit.
You partial to pale faces, Poca-hot-tits?
'Cause I can show you what a real white man's like.
translation.es: Puedo mostrarte cómo es un hombre blanco de verdad.

translation.en: -Yeah, show her, Will. Yeah, go on. -Yeah, shuffle up, Will.
translation.es: - Sí, muéstrale, Will. Vamos. - Sí, apresúrate, Will.

translation.en: -Dance now, boy. -Shuffle on over.
-There you go. -That's some white boy shit right there.
translation.es: - Eso es. - Ese estilo es de hombre blanco.

translation.en: Now, I do want to carve my eyes out.
-What'd you say? -Hey, fellers...
I'd hit the trail before you get hurt.
translation.es: Váyanse antes de que salgan lastimados.

translation.en: [snickering] Before we get hurt?
-Before we get hurt. -[laughing]
I think you've been smokin' too much of that peace pipe, kemo-slobby.
translation.es: Has fumado mucha pipa de la paz, kemo-tonto.

translation.en: -[Left-Eye Boys laughing] -Now, from what I see, there's one of you,
translation.es: Por lo que veo, eres uno,

translation.en: and there's five of us.
Four of you.
What just happened?
You wanna see it again?
-I don't like this shit. -Shut up.
translation.es: - No me gusta esta mierda. - Cállate.

translation.en: Well, that's some, uh... real fancy footwork.
translation.es: Debo reconocer que es un movimiento muy hábil.

translation.en: But I think this hullabaloo has escalated to the firearms stage.
translation.es: Pero este conflicto ya escaló a las armas de fuego.

translation.en: Boys, let's ventilate this.
What the shit that just happened?
[weakly] What the hell? What in the hell?
"Hit the trail." It was so simple.
translation.es: Les dije que se fueran. Era muy sencillo.

translation.en: You must stop doing this, White Knife. One day, there will be too many.
translation.es: Deja de hacer eso, Cuchillo Blanco. Un día, serán muchos.

translation.en: But not today, Smoking Fox.
translation.es: Pero hoy no, Zorra de Fuego.

translation.en: Please, my love... we must go.
[shouting] What the hell happened out here?
Injuns. They went that way.
You ain't no white man.
You're that orphan, White Knife.
Raised like an animal with those Apaches.
translation.es: Criado como un animal con esos apaches.

translation.en: [scoffs] You think you can fool ol' Clem?
translation.es: ¿Crees que puedes engañar al viejo Clem?

translation.en: Sorry, Ringo.
Well, now I'm gonna shoot you and your Injun whore.
translation.es: Pues ahora los mataré a ti y a tu puta india.

translation.en: Gotta cut breakfast short.
You suck, mister!
What are you?
[child] Yes, White Knife.
Go, White Knife.
You lucky, Smoking Fox.
White Knife all man. Bravest of all braves.
translation.es: Cuchillo Blanco es todo un hombre. El más valiente de todos.

translation.en: Not brave. Foolish.
I want to be wife, not widow.
translation.es: Quiero ser su esposa, no su viuda.

translation.en: Afternoon, ladies.
This is Apache land.
I'm not here to take your land, Chief.
translation.es: No vengo a quitarles la tierra, jefe.

translation.en: I'm just looking for a particular boy.
I'm Frank Stockburn.
This boy's mother was my wife.
translation.es: La madre de él era mi esposa.

translation.en: And the boy, Tommy...
he's my son.
It is wise to be slow to trust, White Knife.
translation.es: Es sabio no confiar enseguida, Cuchillo Blanco.

translation.en: But every new journey begins with a single step.
translation.es: Pero cada travesía nueva empieza con un paso.

translation.en: Speak with your father.
But you are my father, Screaming Eagle.
translation.es: Tú eres mi padre, Águila de Trueno.

translation.en: Ever since my mother...
Ever since you found me...
you taught me to hunt, to fight...
translation.es: me enseñaste a cazar, a pelear,

translation.en: when to speak and when to be silent.
-To be a man. -A good man.
translation.es: - A ser un hombre. - Un hombre bueno.

translation.en: And this Frank Stockburn,
he is filled with lies, just like every other white man.
translation.es: dice muchas mentiras, como todos los hombres blancos.

translation.en: Sometimes, the white man speaks the truth.
translation.es: A veces, el hombre blanco dice la verdad.

translation.en: Like, one in 20, 25 times.
I believe this is one of those times.
translation.es: Creo que esta es una de esas veces.

translation.en: He knew your mother, White Knife.
translation.es: Él conocía a tu madre, Cuchillo Blanco.

translation.en: Maybe he can give you some peace. Talk to him.
translation.es: Quizá pueda proporcionarte paz. Habla con él.

translation.en: Maybe after I close my eyes to dream.
Mommy!
One look at me, and you knew your old man had done a lot of bad things, didn't ya?
translation.es: Con una mirada, supiste que tu viejo hizo muchas maldades, ¿no?

translation.en: I cheated men, I killed men...
translation.es: He engañado a los hombres, he matado...

translation.en: So I deserve whatever's comin' to me.
The only one that ever saw any good in me was your mother.
translation.es: La única que veía bondad en mí era tu madre.

translation.en: Why have you come here?
Not a man for chitchat, huh? [chuckles]
translation.es: No eres hombre de mucha charla.

translation.en: Well, me neither.
Kid, I'm dying...
of consumption.
Don't worry...
I'm not looking for no big father-son hoo-ah.
translation.es: No busco demostraciones de afecto entre padre e hijo.

translation.en: "I love you, son." [imitates child's voice] "I love you too, Daddy."
I've come for a more tangible reason.
Tommy, I've been stealing from folks since I was nine years old...
translation.es: Tommy, soy ladrón desde los nueve años

translation.en: and that's the way I've amassed a good little fortune.
translation.es: y así es como he amasado una fortuna.

translation.en: [sighs] I wanna do something decent with it.
translation.es: Quiero hacer algo bueno con eso.

translation.en: I want to give it to you, son.
I don't want your money.
But maybe you could give...
$50,000 to these nice Injuns who raised you.
translation.es: Pero tal vez podrías darles $50 000 a estos buenos indios que te criaron.

translation.en: We'll take it.
Go back to bed.
Sorry.
Seriously, though, we'll take it.
Look, it's buried in the meadow just up the trail,
translation.es: Está enterrado en la pradera, sendero arriba,

translation.en: next to a big ol' pine tree.
What do you say we go dig it up in the morning
and start playing Santa Claus?
translation.es: y empezamos a jugar a Papá Noel?

translation.en: I don't remember much about my mother...
translation.es: No recuerdo mucho de mi madre,

translation.en: but I do remember her telling me...
you were dead.
Maybe it was because...
she didn't want you to come looking for me.
translation.es: porque no quería que fueras a buscarme.

translation.en: She was a smart lady.
Only stupid thing she ever did was fall for me.
translation.es: La única estupidez que hizo fue enamorarse de mí.

translation.en: Meeting Betty Dunson...
was the luckiest thing that ever happened to me.
translation.es: ...fue lo mejor que me pasó en la vida.

translation.en: From the first day I laid eyes on her...
translation.es: Desde el primer día que la vi,

translation.en: she was bawlin' out this...
half-drunk, big ol' burly blacksmith...
translation.es: a un herrero corpulento, medio ebrio...

translation.en: down at Silver Canyon.
She's been the only one, Tommy.
Mom had a temper?
[chuckling] Temper? When she got her dander up, look out.
translation.es: ¿Mal genio? Cuando la enfadaban, había que cuidarse.

translation.en: We was in a saloon once.
translation.es: Una vez, fuimos a una taberna.

translation.en: This fellow sitting next to her
translation.es: Un tipo sentado a su lado

translation.en: starts talking about the perfect way to make a cherry pie...
translation.es: empezó a hablar de la forma perfecta de hacer tarta de cereza...

translation.en: So your mom says to me, "Frank, come here a minute.
translation.es: Entonces tu mamá me dijo: "Frank, ven un momento.

translation.en: Tell me again, just where did you get them flowers?"
translation.es: Dime otra vez. ¿Dónde conseguiste esas flores?".

translation.en: I said, "I know that you think I stole them from the graveyard."
translation.es: Le dije: "Sé que crees que las robé en el cementerio".

translation.en: Good morning, boys.
Morning, Never Wears Bra.
I had dream about you last night, White Knife.
Oh, that's nice.
Not nice dream.
In dream, you naughty.
You naughty, White Knife.
Mmm, somebody's got an admirer.
But like you, there's only one woman for me.
translation.es: Pero al igual que tú, hay solo una mujer para mí.

translation.en: I guess we Stockburns are... partial to the sweet ones.
translation.es: Los Stockburn preferimos a las tiernas.

translation.en: Yes, sir.
Like your mother.
How did she die, Tommy?
You tell me?
Well, there were these big kids at school fixin' to beat me up.
translation.es: Unos chicos grandes de la escuela querían darme una paliza.

translation.en: Instead of facing them myself, I had her walk me there.
translation.es: En vez de enfrentarlos yo solo, le dije que me acompañara.

translation.en: This feller comes out of nowhere...
translation.es: Un tipo salió de la nada,

translation.en: walks right up to her and shoots her dead.
translation.es: se le acercó y la mató de un tiro.

translation.en: So that's how she died, protecting her gutless son
translation.es: Así murió, protegiendo a su hijo cobarde,

translation.en: instead of being home, safe where she belonged.
translation.es: en vez de estar en casa a salvo, donde le correspondía.

translation.en: Who's that? Is that Bony Express?
[Tommy] Bony Express don't come around here.
translation.es: Los del Bony Express no vienen por aquí.

translation.en: He's here somewhere, boys.
Let's burn him out!
Next one goes through your forehead.
translation.es: La próxima te atravesará la frente.

translation.en: Hey, hey! No need to burn nothing, boys!
Howdy, boss.
Cicero...
you're not gonna let a man enjoy his retirement, are ya?
translation.es: no dejarás que un hombre disfrute su retiro, ¿verdad?

translation.en: No, Frank, I salute your decision to turn from your sinful ways.
translation.es: No, Frank, aplaudo tu decisión de dejar el mal camino.

translation.en: But the money... that belongs to all of us.
translation.es: Pero el dinero es de todos nosotros.

translation.en: Touch that steel, boy,
I got plenty of bullets left over after I put one in...
translation.es: me quedarán suficientes balas tras dispararle...

translation.en: your father.
Oh, you finally found your long lost son.
translation.es: Por fin encontraste a tu hijo perdido.

translation.en: Well, I sure hate to break up this nice family reunion.
translation.es: Lamento interrumpir esta bonita reunión familiar.

translation.en: So, why don't you give us the money you stole
translation.es: ¿Por qué no nos das el dinero que robaste

translation.en: before I put lead in your head.
translation.es: antes de que te llene la cabeza de plomo?

translation.en: The money's buried.
Way to run your mouth, son.
It's buried?
Yeah, I buried it.
Deep in the ground... next to a windmill.
translation.es: Bien bajo tierra, junto a un molino.

translation.en: A windmill in the West... doesn't narrow it down much, Frank.
translation.es: Un molino en el Oeste no es una dirección clara.

translation.en: Well, this is a special windmill.
It's a singing windmill.
[Cicero] A singing windmill!
It's about a ten-day ride from here.
translation.es: Está a diez días de aquí a caballo.

translation.en: I'll lead you to it presently on one condition.
translation.es: Te guiaré hasta allá de inmediato con una condición.

translation.en: You don't hurt my boy...
or any of these kindly Injuns here.
translation.es: ...ni a ninguno de estos amables indios.

translation.en: Let's ride, Frank.
Frank, if that $50,000 isn't under that windmill,
translation.es: Frank, si esos $50 000 no están bajo el molino,

translation.en: I'm gonna bury you up to your neck
and let the desert critters eat you alive.
translation.es: para que los bichos del desierto te coman vivo.

translation.en: It's there, Cicero, it's there.
I'm glad I got to meet Betty Dunson's son.
translation.es: Me alegra haber conocido al hijo de Betty Dunson.

translation.en: You just stay here, Tommy.
Enjoy your life with your beautiful bride...
translation.es: Disfruta la vida con tu hermosa prometida...

translation.en: amongst these majestic pine trees.
Let's go!
Well, that was uncool.
White Knife, you must rest.
How can I rest?
When they get to the singing windmill and find no money, they will kill him.
translation.es: Cuando lleguen al molino que canta y no encuentren el dinero, lo matarán.

translation.en: My son, there are too many trees and too little time.
translation.es: Hijo mío, hay demasiados árboles y muy poco tiempo.

translation.en: Then I must get this $50,000 another way.
translation.es: Entonces debo conseguir los $50 000 de otra forma.

translation.en: How? By stealing? There is no honor in that.
Unless I steal from those who have no honor.
translation.es: A menos que se los robe a quienes no son honrados.

translation.en: Ooh... I like that.
But it is too dangerous.
I will send ten of our strongest braves with you.
translation.es: Te enviaré con nuestros diez guerreros más fuertes.

translation.en: The braves would be treated too cruelly in the white man's world.
translation.es: Los tratarían con crueldad en el mundo de los blancos.

translation.en: A lot of them can pass for pale face.
translation.es: Muchos pueden pasar por cara pálidas.

translation.en: Raging Bear can actually do a great impression of a white guy.
translation.es: Oso Rabioso puede pasar por hombre blanco.

translation.en: Hey, guys, let's play with our chest hair and eat potato chips.
translation.es: Oigan, muchachos, juguemos con el pelo del pecho y comamos papitas.

translation.en: Wasn't that great? Where does he come up with this stuff?
translation.es: ¿No estuvo genial? ¿De dónde saca esas ocurrencias?

translation.en: That's very good, Bear, but I must walk this path alone.
translation.es: Está muy bien, Oso, pero debo recorrer este sendero solo.

translation.en: My love... I will get this money... bring it to the singing windmill,
translation.es: Amor, conseguiré el dinero, lo llevaré al molino que canta

translation.en: and be back in time for our wedding.
I won't let you go.
Those men are killers.
I was a coward once and my mother paid the price.
translation.es: Fui cobarde una vez, y mi madre pagó por ello.

translation.en: That will not happen to my father.
translation.es: Eso no le pasará a mi padre.

translation.en: -[horse neighs] -Good morning.
Where in the hell did you come from?
I'm in a bit of a bind, boys.
I rode all the way out here to pan for gold
translation.es: Vine hasta aquí a buscar oro,

translation.en: and my horse up and died on me.
translation.es: y el caballo se me murió.

translation.en: How'd he die?
Suicide.
Drowned himself.
Put his head in the stream and just kept it there.
translation.es: Metió la cabeza al arroyo y no la sacó.

translation.en: Saddest thing you ever seen.
translation.es: Es lo más triste jamás visto.

translation.en: It happens.
Powers that be don't like to admit it, but it happens.
translation.es: A las autoridades no les gusta admitirlo, pero sucede.

translation.en: He looks like an honest white guy.
Hop on.
Much obliged.
[Tommy] Just drop me off at the nearest town.
translation.es: Déjenme en el pueblo más cercano.

translation.en: [man] Ladies and gentlemen, gather around.
Hear the wondrous effects of Dr. Chubb's Vita Oil,
translation.es: Oigan los maravillosos efectos del Aceite Vital del Dr. Chubb,

translation.en: the miracle cure for 1001 ailments.
Put the pep back in your--
Who's this asshole?
Well, now, look at this fella, drinking from the horse trough.
Excuse me.
You there!
What you're doing is disgusting.
That water is for our filthy horses.
translation.es: Esa agua es para nuestros sucios caballos.

translation.en: Water flows from the sky spirit for all its children.
translation.es: El agua fluye del espíritu del cielo para todos sus hijos.

translation.en: Isn't that right, cousin?
We don't cotton to that peyote-smoking nonsense around these parts.
translation.es: No comulgamos con esas tonterías de fumador de peyote por aquí.

translation.en: Do you hear me, "cousin"?
[chuckling] Okay, William, come on back.
You planning on staying in town?
Might need a place to lay my head for a bit.
translation.es: Quizá necesite dónde reposar la cabeza un rato.

translation.en: Sorry about that ugly man that insulted you.
translation.es: Lamento que ese hombre horrible lo haya insultado.

translation.en: He runs the bank, so he thinks he's entitled to be mean to everyone.
translation.es: Maneja el banco y cree tener derecho de maltratar a todos.

translation.en: There's a bank in this town?
Why? You wanna rob it?
I look like a bank robber to you, ma'am?
translation.es: ¿Le parezco un ladrón de bancos, señora?

translation.en: Funny, there's something about you that reminds me of a certain bank robber.
translation.es: Es curioso, tiene algo que me recuerda a un ladrón de bancos.

translation.en: His name was Frank Stockburn.
You know Frank Stockburn?
"Know"? Like, in the biblical sense?
No, ma'am. You've met him before is what I'm asking.
translation.es: No, señora. Le pregunto si lo ha visto.

translation.en: Yes, I met him.
Then, 20 minutes later,
I knew him in the biblical sense on that bed, right there.
translation.es: lo conocí en el sentido bíblico sobre esa cama.

translation.en: And, I knew him, in the biblical sense, twice on this railing.
translation.es: Y dos veces sobre esta barandilla.

translation.en: And then, while doing a handstand on that dresser you're leaning against.
translation.es: Y luego, de cabeza, sobre la cómoda donde te apoyas.

translation.en: Did he happen to mention a singing windmill?
He did mention a singing windmill.
translation.es: Sí, mencionó un molino que canta.

translation.en: He said it sounded like a choir of angels.
translation.es: Dijo que sonaba como un coro de ángeles.

translation.en: Where'd he say it was?
He said that it was in a place where he made his biggest score.
translation.es: En el lugar donde obtuvo su marcador más alto.

translation.en: Whatever that was.
And then he laughed.
He liked to laugh...
and have handstand sex.
Yeah, we gotta get past that.
I miss him.
But he did leave me something to remember him by.
What's this?
I have a brother?
Oh, Burro, we had many adventures together, you and me.
translation.es: Burro, tú y yo hemos vivido muchas aventuras juntos.

translation.en: We're not getting any younger.
At least we have our memories.
Remember the two girls, the sisters, in Deadwood?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas a las dos hermanas en Deadwood?

translation.en: You liked the fat one.
You know it's true.
[Tommy] Ramon Lopez?
I just came from conversating with your mother, Esmerelda.
translation.es: Acabo de conversar con tu madre, Esmerelda.

translation.en: We stumbled upon the fact that your dad and my dad...
translation.es: Llegamos a la conclusión de que tu padre y el mío...

translation.en: are the same fella.
Oh, that's neat.
Same father.
Half-brothers.
What do you think about that, Burro?
So, how is Dad?
Well, he went and got himself kidnapped,
and I need to come up with $50,000 to save his life.
translation.es: y necesito $50 000 para salvarle la vida.

translation.en: That's a lot of pesos.
Sure is.
That's why I'm fixin' to rob the bank here in town.
translation.es: Por eso planeo robar el banco de este pueblo.

translation.en: Hang on.
My father is in trouble.
My brother, he needs my help.
I'll rob the bank with you.
I must do this alone.
What's happening right now?
Ever since I'm pequeño,
I dream about spending one magical day with mi padre,
translation.es: sueño con pasar un día mágico con mi padre,

translation.en: sharing meals, introducing him to the burro.
I will not let go of you until you say I can help you.
translation.es: No te soltaré hasta que me digas que puedo ayudarte.

translation.en: Will you stop brushing me if I say yes?
translation.es: ¿Dejarás de cepillarme si digo que sí?

translation.en: Then you can help.
That means he likes you.
That's a good amount of money you want us to lend you.
translation.es: Quiere que le prestemos una buena suma de dinero.

translation.en: Now, normally, we would require two forms of identification, madam,
translation.es: Normalmente, exigimos dos formas de identificación,

translation.en: but that won't be necessary in your case.
translation.es: pero eso no será necesario en su caso.

translation.en: -[woman sighs] -I feel kinda guilty about this, Burro, taking money from nice people.
translation.es: Me remuerde la conciencia, Burro, quitarle dinero a la gente amable.

translation.en: I mean, it's not like you're some greasy Mexican.
translation.es: Porque usted no es una mexicana grasienta.

translation.en: I feel less guilty now.
What are you doing?
This is a bank!
Get that donkey out of here!
It is a burro, señor.
I don't care, "señor." Get it out!
All right. Vámonos.
The burro don't want to vámonos.
Well, I don't really care what the burro wants.
translation.es: No me importa lo que el burro quiera.

translation.en: Get out of my bank, you beast!
I know what you're thinking, but not yet.
translation.es: Sé qué estás pensando, pero aún no.

translation.en: Hold it.
How is this jackass stuck?
If it got in here, it can certainly get out!
translation.es: ¡Si entró aquí, con seguridad puede salir!

translation.en: It doesn't make sense, it's not logical.
translation.es: No tiene sentido, es ilógico. CAJAS FUERTES Y CERRADURAS T.L. WOODROW

translation.en: They got it locked up good, do they?
Oh! You are leaving!
Gall dang, he felled on his pooper!
-[bank manager] That makes no sense! -[Ramon stammering] I apologize.
translation.es: - ¡Eso no tiene sentido! - Le pido disculpas.

translation.en: -I don't know how many times I could-- -Hey, friend.
translation.es: - No sé cuántas veces podría... - Hola, amigo.

translation.en: Need any help gettin' her out?
[quietly] She's not really stuck, amigo. She's just a diversion.
translation.es: No está atascado de verdad, amigo. Solo finge.

translation.en: She's a virgin?
I'm a virgin, too...
unless you count canty-loupes.
I believe that, but she's a diversion
translation.es: Creo que sí, pero es una distracción

translation.en: to keep the banker busy
so that my brother has time to rob the bank.
translation.es: y que mi hermano tenga tiempo de robar el banco.

translation.en: [stammers] You're robbin' the bank?

I reckon.

Whose place is it?
Your mother?
-[chuckles] -Oh, is she here right now?
Oh, she's dead.

Three months ago?

With your mama?

Squiggly line, asterisk.

All right.

This'll prevent infection.

translation.en: That Smiley fellow, he don't joke around.
[Smiley] Oh... I joke around...
but never when it comes to my business.
Welcome to the Gold Nugget, gentlemen.
Mr. Harris, it's quite a nice spread you got here.
translation.es: Sr. Harris, tiene una bonita propiedad.

translation.en: So what brings you gentlemen to town?
translation.es: ¿Y qué los trae a este pueblo?

translation.en: Actually, we wanted to ask you about something, Mr. Harris.
Excuse me.
I am conversing with these gentlemen, sir. I shall be with you in a moment.
translation.es: Estoy hablando con estos señores. Lo atenderé en un momento.

translation.en: I need to talk to you about Frank Stockburn.
translation.es: Tengo que hablarle de Frank Stockburn.

translation.en: I haven't heard that name in many a year.
translation.es: Hace años que no oía ese nombre.

translation.en: You know him.
Mr. Stockburn and I were business partners.
translation.es: El Sr. Stockburn y yo éramos socios.

translation.en: I got a photograph.
You see, that there's him... and that's you.
translation.es: Este es él... y este es usted.

translation.en: You rode in his gang.
To be precise... it was our gang.
translation.es: Para ser preciso, era nuestra pandilla.

translation.en: He went on to a criminal career of some renown,
translation.es: Él siguió en una carrera de renombre en la delincuencia,

translation.en: while I achieved great success in the legitimate business world.
translation.es: mientras yo logré grandes éxitos en el mundo de los negocios legales.

translation.en: Please help me.
Sir, you are becoming a nuisance.
I just need to tell him what I've done.
translation.es: Solo quiero decirle a él lo que hice.

translation.en: I think he's had enough, boss.
My apologies, gentlemen.
Not my favorite subject.
A round on the house.
translation.es: Una ronda por cuenta de la casa.

translation.en: And, Chico, if you ever grab my arm like that again,
translation.es: Y Chico, si vuelves a agarrarme el brazo así,

translation.en: I'll put six bullets in your head.
translation.es: te meto seis balas en la cabeza.

translation.en: -[groans] -That's quite a beating.
Hope you and your drink are okay.
translation.es: Espero que tú y tu trago estén bien.

translation.en: Why do you want to meet this Frank Stockburn so badly, huh?
translation.es: ¿Por qué tienes tantas ganas de conocer a Frank Stockburn?

translation.en: Frank Stockburn's my father.
If Frank Stockburn is your father, raise your hand.

translation.en: Gall dang!
[Tommy] Chico's right. Getting late, starting to thin out.

translation.en: Can I tell you guys something?
Because I don't wanna have no secrets between us.
translation.es: Porque no quiero secretos entre nosotros.

translation.en: Of course.
-Yeah, we're brothers. -Yeah.
Now, I know Dad is a white man, but my mother... was actually black.
translation.es: Sé que papá es blanco, pero mi mamá era negra.

translation.en: So that, technically, makes me half-black.
translation.es: Eso me hace, técnicamente, medio negro.

translation.en: Is that right?
Well, I didn't wanna hide that from you
in case you guys slipped up and made some racial slurs
translation.es: en caso de que hicieran comentarios racistas

translation.en: -not knowing I wasn't 100% white. -Hmm.
translation.es: sin saber que no soy 100% blanco.

translation.es: Yo sabía que ella debía ser fornida, pero no tenía idea de que fuera negra.

translation.en: Yeah, I mean, I guess, now that you mention it, I see it a little bit.
translation.es: Ahora que lo mencionas, lo noto un poco.

translation.en: My mother's Swedish.
I don't think so. I reckon she's Mexican.
translation.es: No lo creo. Me parece que es mexicana.

translation.en: Lying bitch!
So do you new brothers have any special skills
that could help us out here tonight?

translation.en: Like what?
Like, you know, Tommy's good with knives.

Herm is good at strangling.
-Huh? -I can hold my breath for six minutes.
translation.es: Yo aguanto la respiración por seis minutos.

translation.en: Well, I can play the piano with my dick.
translation.es: Yo toco el piano con mi pito.

translation.en: Well, we're unstoppable then.
Anyways, any of you handsome brothers ready to go steal a big hunk of gold?

translation.en: -I'm ready. -I'm hungry.
-I'm drunk. -And I'm Lil Pete.
Let's get that nugget then.
You've got some pair of huevos coming into my place, son.

translation.en: I sure am sorry about what happened, Mr. Harris.

of the good stuff, if that's okay?
Barkeep, you got any scotch, real scotch, from scotch-land?

translation.en: We keep the imported stuff in the back. I'll go and fetch it for you.

translation.en: That's wonderful.
Now, I didn't hear that, did you?
I did.
I don't know, maybe I'm turned round.
I thought that, like, tonight was gonna be Fajita Friday
translation.es: Creí que esta noche era viernes de fajitas,

translation.en: or line dancing or something.
It just seems quiet, but y'all be good. Stay warm.
translation.es: Parece tranquilo, pero van a estar bien. Quédense calientes.

translation.en: -Hey, he's got the thumbs! -They came with the pants!
Right on the rocks, right on the rocks.
Oh, you're gaining on me! You're gaining on me!
You don't even understand what we're gonna do to--
translation.es: Ni siquiera entiendes qué haremos para...

I'm watching you!
Who's that?
Ladies.
