translation.en: -[women laughing] -Sorry, carry on.
[woman] Smiley, why don't you visit your grandma...
translation.es: Sonriente, ¿por qué no visitas a tu abuela...?

translation.en: [demonic voice] In hell!
[multiple voices] Smiley.
[demonic voice] You cannot escape me, Smiley!
Give me my thumbs back.
[shouting] It's too big, Lil Pete!
What's too big?
Uh... plan B's too big?
What the hell is plan B?
Let me show you.
[shouting] Plan B!
Yeah, works better if you have knives.
[laughs] Yeah, that makes sense.
Come on.
You can take 'em! Come on!
I got the nugget! I got the nugget! What do we do?
-He's shooting like a madman! -Come on!
[Chico] Big bullets! Big bullets! [Danny] Come on! Come on!
-Next man who moves will die! -[all screaming]
Who are you people?
We are the Stockburn brothers.
Frank's kids?
Well... this is interesting.
You know, the last time I saw your father was in Utah.
translation.es: La última vez que vi a su padre fue en Utah.

translation.en: Just rang up our biggest score.
But when we was dividing it up,
we started having trouble with the arithmetic.
And somehow I ended up abandoned beside a windmill,
translation.es: Y me abandonó junto a un molino,

translation.en: knife stuck in my guts, left to die like a dog.
translation.es: con un puñal en las entrañas, para que muriera como un perro.

translation.en: Frank had taken it all.
But now, I get to take something.
The lives of his five ridiculous sons.
translation.es: La vida de sus cinco ridículos hijos.

translation.en: Don't forget about número seis!
Holy moly!
No! Hell, no!
He's giving himself six bullets to the head!
translation.es: ¡Está dándose seis tiros en la cabeza!

translation.en: And he's still smiling!
I was just trying to knock him out.
Well, you succeeded.
I don't think he's waking up from that one.
translation.es: No creo que despierte de esa.

translation.en: You done a number on him, Ramon.
You did! You did a number there.
-Yeah, you did! -Hey! Hey!
[Chico] Plan B was officially insane!
translation.es: ¡El plan B era oficialmente una locura!

translation.en: [Tommy] Here you are, Danny. It's an old Apache remedy.
translation.es: Toma, Danny. Es un viejo remedio apache.

translation.en: Clears your head after too much firewater.
translation.es: Te aclara la cabeza después de mucho aguardiente.

translation.en: You know everything, Tommy. Where'd you learn all this stuff?
translation.es: Lo sabes todo, Tommy. ¿Dónde aprendiste tantas cosas?

translation.en: [grunts] My father taught me.
Dad? I thought you just met him last week.
translation.es: ¿Papá? Creí que lo habías conocido la semana pasada.

translation.en: Not our father. Screaming Eagle.
translation.es: Nuestro padre no. Águila de Trueno.

translation.en: He raised me since I was a kid.
He's the kindest... wisest man I've ever known.
translation.es: Es el hombre más bueno y sabio que he conocido.

translation.en: must've been nice to have a dad.
translation.es: Debió ser agradable tener un papá.

translation.en: Oh, yeah, someone to wrastle with
translation.es: Sí, alguien con quien hacer lucha libre

translation.en: and teach you how to cut up your panny-cakes.
translation.es: y que te enseñara a cortar los panqueques.

translation.en: Someone to give you advice when you screwed up real, real bad.
translation.es: Alguien que te aconsejara cuando metieras la pata.

translation.en: Well, we do got a dad.
And we're gonna see him real soon.
Yeah... I can't wait.
♪ When I meet Dad I must insist ♪
translation.es: Cuando conozca a papá Voy a insistir

translation.en: ♪ On making up for all the time we missed ♪
translation.es: En reponer el tiempo que debimos compartir

translation.en: ♪ We'll talk and drink ♪
♪ And he'll bounce me on his knee ♪
translation.es: Me hará saltar sobre su rodilla

translation.en: ♪ Then we'll search hand in hand for the taco tree ♪
translation.es: Luego, de la mano Buscaremos el árbol de tacos

translation.en: ♪ When I meet Dad I'm gonna ask him why ♪
translation.es: Cuando conozca a papá Le preguntaré por qué

translation.en: ♪ Did he pork my mother then say goodbye ♪
translation.es: Se acostó con mamá y luego la dejó

translation.en: ♪ We're gonna be just like birds of a feather ♪
♪ Playing piano with our dicks together ♪
translation.es: Tocando juntos el piano con nuestros pitos

translation.en: ♪ When I meet Dad ♪
♪ He'll take away my sad ♪
♪ When I see Pa ♪
♪ I'm gonna scream, "Gall dang!" ♪
♪ You're the handsomest man and you're really, really good ♪
translation.es: Eres el hombre más guapo Y eres muy bueno

translation.en: ♪ I love you, Pa And I'm glad you're my pa ♪
translation.es: Te quiero, papá Y me alegra que seas mi papá

translation.en: ♪ Why do I have three nipples? ♪
♪ When we meet Dad ♪
♪ Why does he have three nipples? ♪
Hit it, Herm!
♪ It's fun to have brothers ♪
♪ All from different mothers ♪
♪ Well, I had a dad And now I have two ♪
translation.es: Yo tenía un papá Y ahora tengo dos

translation.en: ♪ But one thing I never had was a mother like you ♪
translation.es: Pero lo que no tuve Como ustedes, fue una madre

translation.en: ♪ She lost her life 'cause of me and I miss her every day ♪
translation.es: Perdió la vida por mi culpa Y la extraño a cada día

translation.en: ♪ Why, oh, why did that evil man ♪
♪ Take my mama away? ♪
♪ I think I'm gonna cry ♪
♪ Quick, Herm, do the headless guy ♪
translation.es: Rápido, Herm, imita al tipo sin cabeza

translation.en: [Tommy] What the...
Okay, boys.
I'm gonna check this out.
translation.es: Voy a ver qué es esto.

translation.en: The ball is in your hand, twist the leg, then you let it go!
translation.es: Tienen la pelota en la mano, giran la pierna ¡y la lanzan!

translation.en: Now, let me see. Ready, men?
You're not listening to me, Hung Shin!
translation.es: ¡No me estás haciendo caso, Hung Shin!

translation.en: You have to be very precise.
Precise...
I say!
You there!
I have a proposition.
How would you men like to participate
in the birth of something extraordinary?
translation.es: en el nacimiento de algo extraordinario?

translation.en: Well, we ain't got time for that, but you can have your brown thing back.
translation.es: No tenemos tiempo para eso, pero le devuelvo su cosa marrón.

translation.en: What's so damnably important
that you need to miss your rendezvous with history?
translation.es: que los obliga a perder una cita con la historia?

translation.en: We gotta save our daddy, Frank Stockburn.
translation.es: Debemos salvar a Frank Stockburn, nuestro papá.

translation.en: Frank Stockburn, the outlaw?
-You know our dad? -Without a doubt.
translation.es: - ¿Conoce a nuestro papá? - Sin duda alguna.

translation.en: One of the best poker players I've ever played against.
translation.es: Es uno de mis mejores contrincantes en el póquer.

translation.en: I played him in Ezekiel Grant's annual Valentine's Day game down in Yuma.
translation.es: Jugué con él el Día de San Valentín cada año en casa de Ezekiel Grant en Yuma.

translation.en: Thousands of dollars on the table, but Stockburn doesn't bat an eyelash.
translation.es: Miles de dólares sobre la mesa, pero Stockburn no pestañeaba.

translation.en: He happen to mention anything about what his biggest score was?
translation.es: ¿Mencionó cuál fue su marcador más alto?

translation.en: Over in Utah? A guy named Smiley Harris?
I'll make you a deal.
Help me out a bit and I'll tell you all I know.
translation.es: Ayúdenme un poco, y les diré todo lo que sé.

translation.en: Deal. Tommy Dunson.
Abner Doubleday. Let's play ball.
translation.es: Abner Doubleday. Juguemos a la pelota.

translation.en: Welcome, my friends, to the first ever playing of a new sport.
translation.es: Bienvenidos, amigos, al primer juego de un nuevo deporte

translation.en: A sport of my own devising.
On this field, two ten-person teams will engage in a battle of--
translation.es: En este campo, dos equipos de diez personas competirán...

translation.en: Yes, Qi?
Only 18 people here.
Two nine-person teams will engage in a battle of strength, speed, and strategy.
translation.es: Dos equipos de nueve personas competirán por fuerza, velocidad y estrategia.

translation.en: One team will go out onto the field to play defense
translation.es: Un equipo saldrá al campo a jugar en defensa

translation.en: while the other team will take turns hitting this ball...
translation.es: mientras el otro le dará a esta pelota por turnos...

translation.en: with a stickie.
What are you gonna call this game?
What else?
Stickie McSchnickens.
Now your goal, ball thrower, is to get the ball past me two times
translation.es: Tu objetivo, lanzador de pelota, es que la bola me pase dos veces

translation.en: without my hitting it.
Fire when ready.
I didn't know you were going to toss it quite so hard, ball thrower.
translation.es: No sabía que lanzarías tan duro.

translation.en: All right.
Okay, that's two past ya. So you're done, right?
translation.es: Ya le pasó dos veces. Terminó, ¿verdad?

translation.en: No, no, I said three times.
No, you said two.
I said three! Three strikes and I'm out.
translation.es: ¡Dije tres! Con tres strikes quedo fuera.

translation.en: I know what I said, shortstop.
That's your new name. Short Stop, that's right.
translation.es: Es tu nuevo nombre. Parador, así es.

translation.en: Now and forever. Forever and ever!
Short Stop. Short Stop, Short Stop.
Strike three! You're out!
No, no, the ball was... too low.
translation.es: No, la pelota estaba... demasiado baja.

translation.en: In order for it to count as a strike, it has to pass through the...
translation.es: Para que sea strike, debe pasar por...

translation.en: strike zone.
-Strike zone? -That's right.
And if you don't get the ball past me, between my knees and my titties,
translation.es: Si no me lanzas la pelota entre las rodillas y las tetillas,

translation.en: it's not a strike.
[stammering] It's a non-strike.
And if you throw me four non-strikes,
I get an express ticket to first base without my even hitting it.
translation.es: puedo pasar a primera base sin golpearla.

translation.en: All right, are we ready?
That also gets me to first base... as well.
translation.es: Con eso también paso a primera base.

translation.en: Where you going? Nobody hit it.
I stole the base. You weren't looking, so I stole it.
translation.es: Robé la base. No estaban mirando, así que la robé.

translation.en: You said you could only advance after you hit the ball!
translation.es: ¡Dijo que solo podía avanzar después de golpear la pelota!

translation.en: Not when you're stealing.
That's bullshit.
Okay, Short Stop.
[Chico] He's moving!
Safe!
Gall dang, I don't know.
-That was a tie. -Yes, and tie goes to the runner!
translation.es: - Fue un empate. - Sí, ¡y el empate lo gana el corredor!

translation.en: Why's that?
Because those are the rules of Stickie McSchnickens, that's why.
translation.es: Porque así son las reglas del Palo McSchnickens.

translation.en: All right, it's all mine, I've got it!
No! No, you can't run. You cannot run.
Infield fly rule... in full effect.
translation.es: Regla de elevado en el cuadrado... en plena vigencia.

translation.en: You're out.
-Here we go, Herm. -[Ramon] Okay, Herm!
Oh, I'm not getting that.
translation.es: No voy a ir por eso.

translation.en: You can just run all the way home. A home runner.
translation.es: Puedes correr hasta tu casa. Home run.

translation.en: I need a cold drink.
Let's take a five-minute stretch and then start the second half.
translation.es: Tomemos un descanso de cinco minutos y empezamos la segunda mitad.

translation.en: Mr. Doubleday, we're done.
But we've only played nine innings.
translation.es: Pero solo hemos jugado nueve entradas.

translation.en: Nine innings is enough. Tell us about Dad's biggest score.
translation.es: Nueve entradas son suficientes. Háblenos del marcador más alto de papá.

translation.en: Fine.
Your father and his gang knocked off an entire cavalry regiment, 120 men,
translation.es: Su padre y su pandilla asaltaron un regimiento de caballería, 120 hombres,

translation.en: five trunks filled with Yankee money.
translation.es: con cinco baúles llenos de dinero yanqui.

translation.en: Where'd that happen?
Up at Sweet Hog Rock... 100 miles due north.
translation.es: En Roca del Palo, 160 km al Norte.

translation.en: You'll know it when you see it.
Well, fellas,
looks like we're going to Sweet Hog Rock to find ourselves a singing windmill.
translation.es: parece que vamos a Roca del Palo a buscar un molino que canta.

translation.en: But we still need another 10,000 bucks.
I reckon we'll make a quick stop, then.
Before you go...
do you wanna line up and shake hands and say "good game" to each other?
translation.es: ¿hacen fila, se estrechan la mano y se dicen "buen juego"?

translation.en: Them boys were nice fellers.
translation.es: SE BUSCAN POR ROBO A BANCO RECOMPENSA: $5000 Esos muchachos fueron amables. Pagaron en efectivo. No decían groserías.

translation.en: Paid in cash. Kept the profanity to a minimum.
translation.es: Esos muchachos fueron amables. Pagaron en efectivo. No decían groserías.

translation.en: And the Mexican brother knocked this hard-ass' head off with a shovel?
translation.es: ¿Y el hermano mexicano decapitó a este cabeza dura con una pala?

translation.en: Dang thing flew nearly 40 feet! And still a-smilin'.
translation.es: ¡La cosa voló más de diez metros! Y seguía sonriendo.

translation.en: Oh! Man!
And hasn't stopped yet.
Oh, hell, no! My man gluing on heads and shit!
translation.es: ¡Diablos, no! ¡Pega cabezas y toda esa mierda!

translation.en: Wish he'd glue the head back on my pecker.
translation.es: Ojalá le pegara la cabeza a mi pito.

translation.en: What happened to your pecker?
I was part of another gang before I joined up with y'all.
translation.es: Yo era de otra pandilla antes de unirme a ustedes.

translation.en: Texas Stubbies.
[stammering] Okay, never mind all that. Okay?
translation.es: Bien, no se preocupen por nada de eso.

translation.en: Now, Doc, you know which way them there Ridiculous 6 rode off to?
translation.es: ¿Usted sabrá donde habrán ido esos Ridículos Seis?

translation.en: We're traveling with a friend of theirs who, uh... -will be real excited to see them. -[snickering]
translation.es: Viajamos con una amiga de ellos que se alegraría mucho de verlos.

translation.en: Well, they headed up north to the Turquoise Trail.
translation.es: Se fueron por el Norte hacia el Sendero Turquesa.

translation.en: I can show you on the map over here.
Looking forward to seeing your man beg for his life?
translation.es: ¿Estás impaciente por ver a tu hombre rogando por su vida?

translation.en: 'Cause that's what's gonna happen, Smoking Fox.
translation.es: Es lo que pasará, Zorra de Fuego.

translation.en: Chicken pox! [laughs]
We're gaining on his Injun-loving ass every day.
translation.es: Cada día nos ganamos más a su india.

translation.en: He messed with the Left-Eye Gang!
translation.es: ¡Él se metió con los Locos Tuertos!

translation.en: He's gonna be like,
"Wait, how did you find me, and where... How did you get my girl?" [laughs]
translation.es: "¿Cómo me encontraron? ¿Cómo encontraron a mi chica?".

translation.en: And then old Dumb Knife's gonna realize that he's in way over his head.
translation.es: Y Cuchillo Tonto se dará cuenta de que está con el agua al cuello.

translation.en: See, when George Washington invented America...
translation.es: Cuando George Washington inventó Estados Unidos...

translation.en: Excuse me, Sheriff.
Is there a church in this town?
This is Rattler's Gulch, you halfwit.
translation.es: Este es Ojo del Diablo, tonto.

translation.en: The meanest, crookedest, most hellacious town in the West.
translation.es: El pueblo más malvado, deshonesto e infernal del Oeste.

translation.en: We don't need no preacher telling us what we can and cannot do.
translation.es: No necesitamos un cura que nos diga qué podemos hacer y qué no.

translation.en: So it's all right if I do this to your wife?
translation.es: Entonces, ¿está bien si le hago esto a su esposa?

translation.en: I can't wait to see all you nice people when I'm dangling!
translation.es: ¡Me muero por verlos, queridos amigos, mientras cuelgo!

translation.en: You sick bastard.
Get this over with.
You're in for a real treat today. This is gonna be so much fun.
translation.es: Se llevarán una gran sorpresa hoy. Esto será muy divertido.

translation.en: I'm just messing with y'all. I'm fine!
translation.es: Solo les tomo el pelo. Estoy bien.

translation.en: I call this one Fish Out of Water.
translation.es: A esto lo llamo "el baile del pescado".

translation.en: ♪ He flies through the air with the greatest of ease ♪
translation.es: Se desplaza por el aire Con gran facilidad

translation.en: ♪ That daring young man on the flying trapeze ♪
translation.es: Ese hombre tan valiente Allá arriba en el trapecio

translation.en: Herm, put the hookers back.
Come on!
Yeah, you can't catch me! [laughing]
He ain't dying, Billy! He's making a fool of you!
translation.es: ¡No está muriendo, Billy! ¡Está burlándose de ti!

translation.en: All right, that's it!
We'll shoot the son of a bitch!
-[Lil Pete continues laughing] -On my command!
-Ready... -[guns cocking]
Aim...
Fire!
Wind took him, Tommy. Came damn close.
translation.es: El viento se la llevó, Tommy. Pasó muy cerca.

translation.en: I'm okay!
Come on, Billy! Get him!
We did it!
♪ Won't be so sad ♪
♪ We're gonna save Dad ♪
We still gotta get to Sweet Hog Rock before they do.
translation.es: Debemos llegar a Roca del Palo antes que ellos.

translation.en: Gotta find that singing windmill, so it ain't over yet.
translation.es: Busquemos ese molino que canta, esto no ha terminado.

translation.en: We got the money!
-The Ridiculous 6 got all the money! -[Chico] Yeah!
translation.es: ¡Los Ridículos Seis ya tienen todo el dinero!

translation.en: Tommy! Tommy! What's Dad like? Is he funny?
Yeah, is he a good listener?
Is he strong?
All great questions. I'll tell you this.
I think you guys are gonna love him.
But I'm sure he's gonna love you guys.
translation.es: Pero estoy seguro de que él va a adorarlos a ustedes.

translation.en: So sorry to interrupt such a tender moment.
translation.es: Lamentamos interrumpir un momento tan tierno.

translation.en: [Nelly Patch] Looks like we stumbled on bath day, boys!
translation.es: ¡Parece que llegamos el día del baño!

translation.en: I heard you picked up some brothers along the way, tough guy.
translation.es: Supe que recogiste hermanos en el camino, chico rudo.

translation.en: But I don't see no resemblance.
translation.es: Pero no les veo ningún parecido.

translation.en: -I do, they all look like my butthole. -[laughing]
translation.es: Yo sí. Todos se parecen a mi ano.

translation.en: So guess what time it is, boys?
Payback time!
Any last words, No Knife? [laughs]
translation.es: ¿Quieres decir tus últimas palabras, Cuchillo Ausente?

translation.en: I told ya I could hold my breath good. Yeah, Danny boy!
translation.es: - Les dije que aguantaba la respiración. - ¡Sí, Danny!

translation.en: What are you doing, man? We gotta go! [gasps]
-Oh, jackpot, boys! -No!
-That's ours! -[Will Patch] Hyah!
Rusty!
Rusty, no, come back!
How are we gonna save him? We're startin' all over.
translation.es: ¿Cómo vamos a salvarlo? Debemos volver a empezar.

translation.en: Is there any more good places we can rob?
You know like a burro-grooming place or a shoe store for burros?
translation.es: ¿Como un lugar para embellecer burros o una tienda de herraduras para burros?

translation.en: Half the lawmen in the West are already looking for us.
translation.es: La mitad de los agentes de la ley del Oeste nos busca.

translation.en: So what? Look, we can't stop.
They're going to kill him!
Ain't no difference. He's dying anyways.
translation.es: Eso no cambia nada. De todos modos está muriendo.

translation.en: Dad's sick.
I'm sorry I didn't tell y'all.
There's a good chance he's dead already.
translation.es: Es muy probable que ya esté muerto.

translation.en: But there's a chance he's not. You got to meet him, Tommy.
translation.es: También es probable que no. Hay que verlo, Tommy.

translation.en: The rest of us...
Even if it was just for five minutes, it'd be worth it.
translation.es: Aunque fueran cinco minutos, valdría la pena.

translation.en: If I don't talk to Dad, I'll die with this dirty secret burnin' a hole in my guts.
translation.es: Si no hablo con papá, moriré con el sucio secreto quemando mis tripas.

translation.en: Danito, whatever it is you did, you have to forgive yourself, man.
translation.es: Danito, debes perdonarte cualquier cosa que hayas hecho.

translation.en: You wouldn't say that if you know what I done.
translation.es: No dirías eso si supieras qué hice.

translation.en: -Everybody's got secrets, Danny. -[Ramon] Yeah.
You guys are the first people I told I was black.
translation.es: Ustedes son los primeros a quienes les conté que soy negro.

translation.en: You know how good that made me feel?
translation.es: ¿Saben qué bien me hizo sentir eso?

translation.en: We're your brothers.
You can tell us anything.
I used to work for the President of the United States.
translation.es: Yo trabajaba para el Presidente de Estados Unidos.

translation.en: I was his personal bodyguard. One of the best.
translation.es: Era su guardaespaldas personal. Uno de los mejores.

translation.en: Till one night...
Mr. President, say, I'm gonna go hit the little boys' room.
translation.es: Sr. Presidente, voy a ir al baño.

translation.en: Are you shitting me?
Come on! You'll be fine, superstar.
Can I get ya something on the way back? Agua? Brewski?
Mrs. Lincoln, how about one of them big pretzels or a little pillow?
translation.es: Sra. Lincoln, ¿le traigo una galleta salada pretzel o un cojín?

translation.en: I hear this play's kind of a long one.
translation.es: Oí decir que esta obra es larga.

translation.en: All right, fair enough. I'll be back in two.
translation.es: Está bien. Regreso en dos minutos.

translation.en: Where's the president's box?
-John Wilkes Booth, the actor? -Yeah.
No way, man! Big fan!
-You wanna say hi to the president? -Yeah.
He'd get a real kick out of that. Last door on the left.
translation.es: Él quedará encantado. Última puerta a la izquierda.

translation.en: -Thank you. [chuckles nervously] -Really cool.
Wow! Love that guy!
-[gunshot] -[woman screams]
translation.es: CARTELERA - TEATRO FORD OUR AMERICAN COUSIN

translation.en: [screaming] Abe!
[sighs] How can you go on living your life knowing you harmed so many people?
translation.es: ¿Cómo puede uno seguir viviendo a sabiendas de que lastimó a tanta gente?

translation.en: That's what I wanna ask Dad.
translation.es: Es lo que quiero preguntarle a papá.

translation.en: Hey, you ain't the one who pulled that trigger.
But if Dad's gotta be the one who tells you that...
translation.es: Pero si debes oír eso de boca de papá,

translation.en: then let's go get that money.
I just wish I knew how.
Herm's got an idea.
He just can't express it.
I just wish somebody here could speak Herm.
[man] Tomorrow is Valentine's Day.
translation.es: Mañana es el Día de San Valentín.

translation.en: That's when Ezekiel Grant has his annual high-stakes poker game.
translation.es: Es el día del juego anual de póquer de Ezekiel Grant con grandes apuestas.

translation.en: There'll be oodles of money there. Oodles, I say.
-I don't know. That sounds risky. -What's risky?
translation.es: - No sé. Suena arriesgado. - ¿Qué es arriesgado?

translation.en: He's suggesting we... knock off Ezekiel Grant's poker game.
translation.es: Sugiere que asaltemos el juego de póquer de Ezekiel Grant.

translation.en: -It's in Yuma tomorrow night. -[speaks gibberish]
translation.es: Es en Yuma mañana en la noche.

translation.en: Yuma's less than a day's walk from here.
translation.es: Queda a menos de un día de aquí a pie.

translation.en: That poker game, there's practically gonna be an army protectin' it.
translation.es: Habrá prácticamente un ejército protegiendo ese juego de póquer.

translation.en: If Tommy says we can beat 'em, I'll believe him.
translation.es: Si Tommy dice que podemos vencerlos, le creeré.

translation.en: -We all will. -[grunts]
We can beat 'em...
for Dad.
[all] For Dad!
I hope you like the gift I'm giving you for Valentine's Day, Ezekiel.
translation.es: Ojalá te guste mi regalo del Día de San Valentín, Ezekiel.

translation.en: I'll give you a hint. One-hour massage, no charge.
translation.es: Te daré una pista. Una hora de masaje gratis.

translation.en: Oh, Susannah.
You know what gift I'd really love?
If you would just shut up!
Nothing ruins a good poker game more...
translation.es: Nada arruina más un juego de póquer...

translation.en: than a lady jabbering on and on...
-How romantic. -[knocking on door]
Well, General Custer!
Yes, at your service.
Mr. Mark Twain.
-Word up! -Gentlemen, do come in.
Yo, Zeke, big boy, I was just going off to the General here about my new book.
translation.es: Zeke, estaba hablándole al General de mi nuevo libro.

translation.en: -It's a sequel to Tom Sawyer. -Ooh.
translation.es: Es la continuación de Tom Sawyer.

translation.en: It's about Sawyer's home slice, Huckleberry Finn.
translation.es: Es sobre el buen amigo de Sawyer, Huckleberry Finn.

translation.en: White boy goes raftin' with a brother. People gonna lose their shit!
translation.es: Un niño blanco se va de rafting con uno negro. ¡La gente se escandalizará!

translation.en: And, General Custer, I see you've let your dashing blond hair grow out.
translation.es: General Custer, veo que se dejó crecer su elegante cabello rubio.

translation.en: Well, yes, the barber down at the regiment is just awful,
translation.es: Sí, el barbero del regimiento es pésimo,

translation.en: so I had two choices, either let it grow or get scalped.
translation.es: así que tengo dos opciones, dejarlo crecer o que me rapen.

translation.en: -And I ain't gonna let that happen. -[Mark and Ezekiel laughing]
translation.es: Y no dejaré que eso pase.

translation.en: Now, will our old friend from Tombstone be joining us?
[Ezekiel] Late as usual.
But we have a new player, a wealthy Mexican coffee bean rancher.
translation.es: Pero tenemos un nuevo jugador, un cafetero mexicano adinerado.

translation.en: Am I tardy-o?
Oh. [laughing] Sneaky little Mexican.
May I present Don Don Diego.
translation.es: Les presento a Don Don Diego.

translation.en: We run a gentleman's game here, Mr. Diego.
translation.es: Este es un juego de caballeros, Sr. Diego.

translation.en: Your, uh, two bodyguards are completely unnecessary.
translation.es: Sus dos guardaespaldas no son necesarios.

translation.en: Bodyguards? [laughing]
[lisping] You're mistaken, General.
This is, um...
Chimichanga... my loyal manservant.
God bless you.
[Ramon] And, um...
Blanco Beardio.
He'll be providing the entertainment for this afternoon's festivities.
translation.es: A cargo del entretenimiento de las celebraciones de la tarde.

translation.en: Well, drop me a beat.
All right.
Here we go now.
Gentlemen, the buy-in is $15,000.
Fifteen large? Are you sure General Custard can swing that?
translation.es: ¿Quince mil? ¿Seguro el general Costra puede gastarlos?

translation.en: It's Custer, not "Custard." There is no "D." I'm not a dessert.
translation.es: Es Custer, no "Costra". Sin "O". No soy una costra.

translation.en: Boom, I just dropped some satire on your ass, General!
You got me!
Hey! Now, when Ramon gives the signal that the time is right,
translation.es: Cuando Ramón dé la señal de que es hora,

translation.en: that's when we move in.
You remember the signal, right?
-[man] Gentlemen. -You know where to go, Marshal.
translation.es: - Señores. - Ya sabe adónde ir, Mariscal.

translation.en: Oh, hell, no!
That's Wyatt Earp!
The fastest gun in the West?
All right, all right, all right!
-Oh, Wyatt Earp, as I live and breathe! -[whispers] Wyatt Earp.
[Ezekiel] You're here! [General Custer] Wyatt Earp.
[Wyatt] Sorry I'm late, everybody.
But apparently, there's some new gang out there robbing everybody blind.
translation.es: Parece que hay una nueva pandilla que roba descaradamente a todos.

translation.en: Oh, they call themselves the Ridiculous 6.
translation.es: Se hacen llamar Los Ridículos seis.

translation.en: I swear, a man can't ride five miles in this territory
translation.es: Uno no anda ni diez kilómetros en este territorio

translation.en: without running into outlaws, rattlesnakes, Injuns and--
translation.es: sin encontrar forajidos, serpientes de cascabel, indios y...

translation.en: Hey! Why don't you let me worry about the Injuns?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no dejas que yo me encargue de los indios?

translation.en: -[all laughing] -[Wyatt] Will do, General.
What's shakin', Twain?
Hey, I'm good on anything. Just like gravy, baby.
-Good to see you, my man. -You too, man.
translation.es: - Me alegra verte. - Lo mismo digo.

translation.en: Hey! I finally read Prince and the Pauper.
translation.es: Por fin leí El príncipe y el mendigo.

translation.en: Oh, is that right?
Didn't get it.
For reals?
-Satire! Boom! I got ya! -[all laughing]
-I'm just pulling your leg. -Oh, man.
translation.es: - Solo te tomo el pelo. - Vaya.

translation.en: I can't read.
Good one with the... satire.
[laughs] Funny.
Who's this idiot?
Um... I am Don...
Don Don Diego.
Well, Don, I'm Wyatt...
Wyatt Wyatt Earp.
Got him.
[in sing-song voice] Now let's play some cards!
♪ Say, say Tom Sawyer ♪
♪ Say Tom Sawyer ♪
♪ Say the blacks and the whites are getting along ♪
translation.es: Digan que los negros y los blancos se entienden

translation.en: ♪ The blacks and the whites are getting along ♪
translation.es: Los negros y los blancos se entienden

translation.en: ♪ I can't read ♪
-[screaming] -[Ezekiel] Please calm yourself!
Let's get inside before this Wyatt Earp ruins our plan.
translation.es: Entremos antes de que Wyatt Earp arruine nuestro plan.

translation.en: But there's no way for you to sneak past them guys, Tommy.
translation.es: No podrás entrar a hurtadillas, Tommy.

translation.en: There's no rocks, no trees, no nothing to hide behind.
translation.es: No hay piedras, árboles ni nada donde ocultarte.

translation.en: No need to hide, brother, when you are friends with the wind.
translation.es: No hay que ocultarse, hermano, cuando eres amigo del viento.

translation.en: I'm telling you, down there, they don't call it "Mexico."
It's "Mehico." The "X" is an "H." I'm presuming Texas is "Tehas."
translation.es: Se dice "Méjico". La "X" suena como "J". Supongo que a Texas le dicen "Tejas".

translation.en: Now, what's this?
Just a tumbleweed, you jumpy bastard.
That is some mystical shit.
I wish to move the dresser in my bedroom closer to the window,
translation.es: Quiero mover el tocador de mi cuarto más cerca de la ventana,

translation.en: but I haven't the strength to do it myself.
translation.es: pero no tengo la fuerza para hacerlo sola.

translation.en: I'd love to help, ma'am, but I really should keep playing the piano.
translation.es: Me encantaría ayudarla, señora, pero debo seguir tocando piano.

translation.en: -[piano music continues playing] -No one will even know you're gone.
-Gentlemen, cough up your buy-ins. -All right!
Make it rain like Twain.
[General Custer] Take that and that. [Mark] Yeah!
Sure is some good hooch there, Zeke. Where'd you find that?
translation.es: El licor es bueno, Zeke. ¿Dónde lo compraste?

translation.en: Oh, I got that from a case about, uh, 20 years ago.
translation.es: Venía en una caja que conseguí hace como 20 años.

translation.en: In fact, uh, you know that shack up by Jawbone Falls?
-Yeah. -There was a lady living there.
It was one of Frank Stockburn's many paramours.
translation.es: Era una de las muchas amantes de Frank Stockburn.

translation.en: Now this was one of the ugliest ladies I've ever seen in my life.
translation.es: Una de las mujeres más feas que he visto en mi vida.

translation.en: Sounds like a real bucket of turds.
But she was a very talented distiller of alcohol.
translation.es: Pero era muy talentosa para destilar alcohol.

translation.en: [chucking] So, while she--
While she's loading up my coach, her young boy comes out,
translation.es: Mientras ella me cargaba el carruaje, salió su hijo,

translation.en: this big shambling oaf, mute, filthy as a hog,
translation.es: un tonto desastroso, mudo, sucio como un cerdo,

translation.en: and he starts doing this horrible little tap dance
translation.es: y empezó a bailar tap de una forma horrible

translation.en: whilst singing "The Star-Spangled Banner."
Well, not singing it, really, but grunting it, like a caveman!
translation.es: ¡No lo cantaba en realidad, sino que lo gruñía como un cavernícola!

translation.en: [grunting] ♪ Oh, say can you see ♪
You know, he wants me to throw him some pennies,
translation.es: Quería que le lanzara unos centavos,

translation.en: so I fished a coin out of my pocket
translation.es: así que pesqué una moneda en mi bolsillo

translation.en: and I guess I don't know my own strength.
translation.es: y supongo que no conozco mi propia fuerza.

translation.en: I tossed it, hit him in the mouth, and knocked his tooth out!
translation.es: Se la lancé, le di en la boca, ¡y le tumbé un diente!

translation.en: What an asshole!
[mumbles] Mama.
In any event, I still have one bottle left from that case.
translation.es: De todos modos, me queda una botella de esa caja.

translation.en: I'll go fetch it and we can drink a toast to that awful woman and her hideous son.
translation.es: Iré a traerla y podemos brindar por esa mujer espantosa y su hijo feo.

translation.en: Oh, she was ugly! You wouldn't even sleep with her.
translation.es: ¡Ella era fea! Ni siquiera tú te acostarías con ella.

translation.en: Say, Don Don Diego...
where's your buy-in? I thought it was 15 grand a man.
translation.es: ...¿dónde está su apuesta? Creí que eran $15 000 por cabeza.

translation.en: Let's see. Ah!
It's you!
What?
What "what"?
What are you so surprised about?
Just so surprised at all the... the fun that we're having here,
with the card and the money and the booze and...
translation.es: con las cartas, el dinero, el trago y...

translation.en: You know, I make that same face when I put my cologne on in the morning,
translation.es: Yo hago esa cara cuando me pongo la colonia en la mañana,

translation.en: especially when I'm home alone.
translation.es: en especial cuando me siento un pobre angelito.

translation.en: You know what I think?
I think Don Don Diego isn't really a coffee bean rancher at all.
translation.es: Que Don Don Diego no es ningún cafetero.

translation.en: And his true purpose here is to rob us.
translation.es: Y que solo vino a robarnos.

translation.en: Don't make me kill you, Mr. Earp. Hands up high.
translation.es: No me obligue a matarlo, Sr. Earp. Manos arriba.

translation.en: Oh, snap! You got the drop on Wyatt Earp?
It's mi hermano. He's one bad hombre. [laughs]
translation.es: Es mi hermano. Es un hombre malo.

translation.en: [Tommy] No disrespect, fellas.
We're gonna have to tie you up, and we'll have to borrow your horses.
translation.es: Vamos a amarrarlos y a tomar prestados sus caballos.

translation.en: Ooh, what'd I miss?
[Ramon] Sweet Hog Rock, here we come!
[Ramon] Giddy up, Burro.
[Danny] Come on, Ramon!
[Chico] Right behind you, Tommy!
[Ramon] Hurry up, Burro! Move your ass!
[Tommy] Yeah, I think we found it.
That is one sweet hog right there.
That is a sweet, majestic hog.
translation.es: Es un palo genial y majestuoso.

translation.en: Yeah, that's a sweet one for sure.
It's all right.
I'm confused. I don't see a hog or a pig anywhere.
translation.es: Estoy confundido. No veo un palo ni un cerdo en ninguna parte.

translation.en: [chuckling] All I see is the big old rock that looks like a weenie pee-pee.
translation.es: Solo veo una piedra vieja que parece un pito.

translation.en: -Oh, you guys call a pee-pee a "hog." -Yeah.
-That's weird. I like it, though. [laughs] -Yeah. Okay.
translation.es: - Qué raro. Pero me agrada. - Sí. Está bien.

translation.en: Problem is, I don't see no singing windmill anywhere.
translation.es: Lo malo es que no veo el molino que canta por ninguna parte.

translation.en: -[distant humming] -Wait...
I hear it.
Yeah, it's coming from over there.
[Lil Pete] Ah! Daddy! Daddy!
We're saved! We're saved!
Oh, it's just these assholes.
What the hell happened to you guys?
[spits] We was headed west to Frisco after we absconded with your loot.
translation.es: Huimos con su botín por el oeste hacia San Francisco.

translation.en: But we ran into these real bad characters.
translation.es: Pero nos topamos con unos personajes muy malvados.

translation.en: It was Cicero something and his crazy-ass gang.
translation.es: Un tal Cicero con su pandilla de locos.

translation.en: Cicero was here? Then he left?
[voice breaking] He left us in the dirt for fun.
Who does that?
Sicko! [screams]
If this is where the singing windmill is, then why would they just up and leave?
translation.es: Si aquí queda el molino que canta, entonces ¿por qué se fueron?

translation.en: Maybe that Stickie McSchnickens guy was just pulling our leg.
translation.es: Quizá ese tipo del Palo McSchnickens nos tomó el pelo.

translation.en: They went north... about two hours ago.
translation.es: Se fueron hacia el Norte hace una dos horas.

translation.en: Oh, yeah! Tommy can track 'em.
Let's saddle up. We're burning daylight.
[Left-Eye Boys] Wait!
[Will Patch] You can't just leave us here, you gotta get us out!
translation.es: No pueden dejarnos aquí, ¡tienen que sacarnos!

translation.en: -[snake rattling] -You don't need to-- Hey, hey, hey! We still got the money!
translation.es: No tienen que... ¡Oigan! ¡Aún tenemos el dinero!

translation.en: Yeah, I hid it in my pants. [stuttering] We'll give it back to ya!
translation.es: Me lo escondí en los pantalones. ¡Se lo devolveremos!

translation.en: We don't need no more. Let's go!
Hey! Can you at least help me pick these ants out of my beard before you head out?
translation.es: Al menos, ¿me ayudan a quitarme las hormigas de la barba antes de irse?

translation.en: Please?
Tell you what, we'll dig you up on one condition.
translation.es: Tengo una idea. Los desenterraremos con una condición.

translation.en: -[all exclaiming] -You say it, we'll do it!
That you give up your lives of crime
translation.es: Que renuncien a la vida de delincuencia

translation.en: and take this second chance to start doing good by people.
translation.es: y aprovechen esta segunda oportunidad para ayudar a la gente.

translation.en: -I'd rather die! -Hell, no! I ain't doing that!
No way! Dumb Indian half!
That was a joke! That was a joke!
I'll be a good boy! I'll be a good boy, Daddy!
[Ramon] Now what? East or west?
Late in the day.
Lot of traffic been going through here.
translation.es: Mucho tráfico ha pasado por aquí.

translation.en: It's going to take a minute.
Well, we must be getting mighty close.
They'd better be treating Dad well, or they're gonna have to answer to us.
translation.es: Más les vale que traten bien a papá, o van a rendirnos cuentas.

translation.en: There he is. -There's the man himself. -[Herm grunting]
-Look at that handsome hombre. -[Danny] Yeah.
translation.es: - Miren a ese hombre tan guapo. - Sí.

translation.en: -That's where we get our good looks. -[chuckling]
Let me see ol' Pop.
[Ramon] Does he still look like that, Tommy?
Yeah, he does.
Let's set up camp tonight. Right out there.
But we can't waste any time.
Chico... I can't figure it out right now.
I gotta...
Just give me till sunrise. Let me think.
translation.es: Denme hasta el amanecer. Déjenme pensar.

translation.en: [Tommy] Dear brothers,
by the time you read this, I will have caught up with Dad.
translation.es: Cuando lean esto, ya habré alcanzado a papá.

translation.en: And I'm sure you're sore at me for sneaking out on you.
translation.es: Seguramente se enfadarán conmigo por escabullirme.

translation.en: But this fellow, Cicero, who took Pa, also took my mother's life,
translation.es: Pero Cicero, el tipo que secuestró a papá, también mató a mi madre,

translation.en: and I mean to make him pay for that.
translation.es: y le haré pagar por eso.

translation.en: Things might get messy.
I can live with all the bad stuff we've done,
translation.es: Puedo vivir con toda la maldad que hemos hecho:

translation.en: the hold-ups, the burglaries, the accidental decapitation,
but I couldn't live with myself if something happened to one of you.
translation.es: pero nunca me perdonaría si algo le pasara a uno de ustedes.

translation.en: So stay put and I'll be back with Dad as soon as I can.
translation.es: Quédense aquí, y regresaré con papá en cuanto pueda.

translation.en: And if I don't come back, know that I love you boys with all my heart.
translation.es: Si no regreso, quiero que sepan que los quiero con toda mi alma.

translation.en: Your brother, Tommy.
[Tommy] Whoa.
[Frank] Down at Silver Canyon...
Meeting Betty Dunson... was the luckiest thing that ever happened to me.
translation.es: Conocer a Betty Dunson fue lo mejor que me pasó en la vida.

translation.en: Mom was his biggest score.
translation.es: Mamá fue su marcador más alto.

translation.en: [Cicero] Here we are.
We'd better not have come all this way for nothing.
translation.es: Ojalá no hayamos venido hasta aquí por nada.

translation.en: -I want the money, Frank. -I know what you want.
translation.es: - Quiero el dinero, Frank. - Sé qué quieres.

translation.en: [Tommy] There's your money.
Count it.
Oh, look who showed up.
I didn't know if somebody dug up what you buried, Pa,
translation.es: No sabía si alguien había desenterrado lo que enterraste, papá,

translation.en: so I wanted to make sure you were covered either way.
translation.es: así que quise asegurarme de que estabas protegido.

translation.en: Thank you, son.
Well, ain't that a good boy.
That's my boy.
Well, it's been a pleasure, Frank.
But, uh... we'll be on our way.
Not so fast.
You and me got some unfinished business.
translation.es: Tú y yo tenemos una cuenta pendiente.

translation.en: No, our business is done.
Pa... you remember how I told you Ma died?
translation.es: Papá, ¿recuerdas que te conté cómo murió mamá?

translation.en: Well, the son of a bitch who shot her...
translation.es: El hijo de puta que la mató...

translation.en: had a tattoo on his hand...
just like Cicero here.
What, you mean...
my little horseshoe?
That's always brought me luck.
Especially when I was shooting somebody.
translation.es: En especial, al dispararle a alguien.

translation.en: Well, killer, your luck just ran out.
translation.es: Asesino, acabas de quedarte sin suerte.

translation.en: Your hand touch that knife, boy,
it'll be the last thing you ever touch.
Oh, I ain't using these knives.
Not for my mama.
I saved a special one just for you.
translation.es: Tengo uno especial solo para ti.

translation.en: Now you die, Injun-lover.
translation.es: Ahora morirás, amante de los indios.

translation.en: He dies, you die.
Fourteen of us, six of you. Doesn't seem quite fair, does it?
translation.es: Nosotros somos 14, ustedes, seis. No parece justo, ¿o sí?

translation.en: Make that twelve of us.
[shouting] Twelve of us!
I ain't sign up for this shit.
translation.es: Yo no me apunté a esta mierda.

translation.en: You seeing this?
-It's not working. -What are you doing?
Don't look like a tumbleweed at all, Herm.
translation.es: No pareces una planta rodadora, Herm.

translation.en: Herm, come back! Come back, Herm.
All right, all right. Now, everybody just calm down.
A man's entitled... to kill his mother's killer.
translation.es: Un hombre tiene derecho de matar al asesino de su madre.

translation.en: Plus... that's one less guy you've got to split the money with!
translation.es: Además, ¡es un tipo menos con quien compartir el dinero!

translation.en: Good thinking, Frank. Let's ride!
[Gus Patch] Yeah! [Will Patch] Yeah, get on out of here!
Good job, son. I'm really proud of you.
translation.es: Buen trabajo, hijo. Estoy muy orgulloso de ti.

translation.en: And getting your friends to come all the way out here with you, brilliant.
translation.es: Y que tus amigos vinieran hasta aquí contigo fue brillante.

translation.en: Well, sir... they ain't just my friends, they, uh...
They're my brothers.
Five?
You had fun, didn't you, sir?
Well, I'm gonna introduce myself.
-I think they'd like that. -[clears throat]
Frank Stockburn, your dad.
-Nice to meet you. -Nice to meet you.
-Father. -Son.
This is my burro.
Proud to know you, Burro.
He's proud.
You must be, uh, Saint Louis, right?
translation.es: Tú debes ser el de Saint Louis, ¿verdad?

translation.en: Boy, you got your mom's muscles.
translation.es: Tienes los músculos de tu mamá.

translation.en: You a prizefighter?
No, actually, I'm a... piano player.
Oh, well, I'll be!
You know, I've been known to tickle the ivories myself.
translation.es: También me conocían por tocar las teclas de marfil.

translation.en: Now and then, you know.
We should play together sometime. [chuckles]
I'd like that, Dad.
[voice breaking] I'd like that a lot.
Yeah, son, we'll do that.
You must be Delilah's boy.
translation.es: Tú debes ser el hijo de Delilah.

translation.en: Boy, she made some fine, fine whiskey.
translation.es: Ella me hacía un whisky muy bueno.

translation.en: She must've been really hitting it hard when she was pregnant with you.
translation.es: Debió de beber mucho cuando estaba embarazada de ti.

translation.en: Atta boy, atta boy.
[grunts] Da-da.
And, uh... you are?
I'm Lil Pete. I'm your son! I love you so much, Dad!
translation.es: ¡Soy tu hijo Pequeño Pete! ¡Te adoro, papá!

translation.en: -I have three nipples. -Yeah, well...
It's always good to have a spare.
translation.es: Siempre es bueno tener un repuesto.

translation.en: -Gall dang, you have one, too? -Yeah.
Do you like to play with the extra one?
Oh, you betcha.
Oh, Pa, I have a question for you.
Where do babies come from?
Well, son, the mom just poops 'em out.
translation.es: Bueno, hijo, la mamá los caga.

translation.en: [laughing] I knewed it! I knewed it, Dad!
Well, look at this handsome devil.
Sir, I'm Danny.
It's awful nice to finally meet ya.
translation.es: Es un gusto conocerlo por fin.

translation.en: Could you help me with a problem?
I did a real stupid thing
that inadvertently led to the death of a United States President,
translation.es: que llevó a la muerte a un presidente de Estados Unidos,

translation.en: and I'm feeling pretty lousy about it.
translation.es: y me siento terrible por eso.

translation.en: Well, son... look in my eyes.
Shit happens.
Thanks. Thank you, sir.
-[Frank] You're welcome. -[exhales]
So, where to now, huh?
Well, sir, Smoking Fox and me are getting married in a few days,
translation.es: Zorra de Fuego y yo nos casaremos dentro de unos días,

translation.en: and Screaming Eagle's walking her down the aisle,
translation.es: Águila de Trueno la llevará al altar,

translation.en: and I was hoping...
you could be there, next to me.
Oh, you mean your best man?
Yes, sir.
You know, that's... that's quite an honor.
-It would be my honor, sir. -Yeah. Well, uh...
But unfortunately, I...
I got some business up north that I gotta attend to.
translation.es: ...tengo un asunto pendiente en el Norte.

translation.en: I gotta collect some gambling debts and...
translation.es: Debo cobrar deudas de juego y...

translation.en: You know, just to pay the doctors and such.
translation.es: Ya sabes, pagarles a los médicos y eso.

translation.en: Say, Dad. You don't ever gotta worry about money ever again.
translation.es: Papá, no tienes que preocuparte por dinero nunca más.

translation.en: We had to conjure up 50 grand twice!
So we ended up with 100!
-A hundred? -[Tommy] Yes, sir.
There's another 50 grand?
Yes, sir.
Right here, in the burro's saddlebag.
translation.es: Aquí, en la alforja del burro.

translation.en: So that business can wait up north, can't it... best man?
translation.es: Ese asunto del Norte puede esperar, ¿no, padrino?

translation.en: Well, now that you mention it, maybe I should change my plans.
translation.es: Ahora que lo mencionas, quizá deba cambiar de planes.

translation.en: Hey! What are they doing back?
What is this?
I guess it's time you kids
learned the truth about your dear old dad, huh?
translation.es: sepan la verdad sobre su querido viejo.

translation.en: I'm just too famous.
I can't walk into any town west of the Rockies
translation.es: No puedo entrar a ningún pueblo al oeste de las Rocosas

translation.en: without someone calling the law.
translation.es: sin que alguien llame a la ley.

translation.en: So, I came up with a way we could make 50 grand
translation.es: Entonces se me ocurrió una forma de que consiguiéramos $50 000

translation.en: without lifting a finger. [chuckles]
And you rascals brought us double!
translation.es: Y ustedes, pillos, ¡nos trajeron el doble!

translation.en: Are these my kids or what?
Son of a bitch!
If our two gangs joined forces,
translation.es: Si nuestras dos pandillas unieran fuerzas,

translation.en: there's not a lawman in the West that would stand up against us.
translation.es: ningún agente del orden se nos enfrentaría en el Oeste.

translation.en: What makes you think we'd turn to a life of crime?
translation.es: ¿Qué te hace creer que adoptaríamos una vida de delito?

translation.en: 'Cause it's in your blood.
translation.es: Porque lo llevan en la sangre.

translation.en: Answer me something.
Were you ever great at anything in your life besides stealing?
translation.es: ¿Fueron excelentes para algo en la vida además de robar?

translation.en: You apples didn't fall far from this tree.
Don't deny who you are.
If you knew who we really were,
translation.es: Si supieras quiénes somos en realidad,

translation.en: you'd be very scared right now.
translation.es: estarías muy asustado en este momento.

translation.en: Don't overplay your hand, son.
translation.es: No te pases de listo, hijo.

translation.en: I'm still holding an ace.
translation.es: Aún tengo un as bajo la manga.

translation.en: I found her. I-- I told you I'd find her.
translation.es: La encontré. Les dije que la encontraría.

translation.en: This little beauty stumbled into our camp a few days ago.
translation.es: Esta pequeña belleza apareció en nuestro campamento hace unos días.

translation.en: She actually tried to rescue me.
I'm guessing this means you don't want me to be your best man no more, huh?
translation.es: Supongo que, con esto, ya no querrás que sea tu padrino.

translation.en: Well, I'm gonna make this real simple for you.
Hand over the other 50 grand... in that stupid ass' saddlebag,
translation.es: Entrégame los otros $50 000 de la alforja de este estúpido asno,

translation.en: or I put a bullet in her pretty Apache head.
translation.es: o le meto una bala a su bonita cabeza de apache.

translation.en: That ain't gonna happen.
Oh, it ain't?
No, sir.
Why's that?
Mmm... kind of a secret.
Well, you can tell your old man, can't ya?
You know that bag... -your boy's holding? -Uh-huh.
translation.es: ¿Ves el bolso que tiene tu muchacho?

translation.en: It was meant for Cicero. So there's something special in there.
translation.es: Era para Cicero. Entonces tiene algo especial.

translation.en: -Plan B. -Plan B?
[garbled] Plan B.
Give me that bag.
Oh, shit!
[Tommy whispering] Where is she?
Smoking Fox.
Nighty-night, son.
-Danny, are you all right? -[groaning]
You done good, Daniel. You saved me.
It's my duty, Mr. President.
Mrs. Lincoln.
Come on! Come on! Come here.
[Frank] Get in.
I got one!
Clem, you almost shot me!
[man] Come on, get the horses!
My ass! My ass!
Is this here still valid, or is it too burnt up?
Let me take a look here.
Uh, that looks good to me. I mean, this looks good.
What in the hell?
You didn't scoop yours out, did you?
What was the question again?
What?
Did any of you really do it?
translation.es: ¿Alguno de ustedes lo hizo de verdad?

translation.en: Well, then whose eyes are in that jar?
translation.es: Entonces, ¿de quién son los ojos de ese frasco?

translation.en: Well, Babyface found some rocks, and, uh, painted them.
translation.es: Babyface encontró unas piedras y las pintó.

translation.en: Surprise?
[echoing] Hey, Tom, you wanna play a game
to make up for all the father-son time we missed?
translation.es: para recuperar el tiempo perdido entre padre e hijo?

translation.en: Peek-a-boo.
[Frank] Hey, come over here!
No, come over there!
You could have had everything, son.
But you had to do the right thing.
translation.es: Pero tenías que hacer lo correcto.

translation.en: Let me leave you with a bit of fatherly advice.
translation.es: Te daré un consejo paternal antes de irme.

translation.en: -Never bring a knife to a gunfight. -[gun cocking]
translation.es: Nunca lleves un cuchillo a un tiroteo.

translation.en: [Tommy] One day, there will be too many, my love.
translation.es: Un día, serán muchos, mi amor.

translation.en: [Smoking Fox] But not today.
That was some mystical shit.
You knew Cicero killed my mother.
translation.es: Sabías que Cicero mató a mi madre.

translation.en: No, I didn't know that.
No more lies!
Yeah, I knew. I knew.
Your mother insisted on telling.
She was going to rat the whole gang out, and I tried to convince her--
translation.es: Iba a delatar a la pandilla, e intenté convencerla...

translation.en: Tommy, look, I'm your father, for God's sake.
translation.es: Soy tu padre, por el amor de Dios.

translation.en: You don't kill your father, Tommy.
translation.es: Uno no mata a su padre, Tommy.

translation.en: His name is White Knife.
I ain't gonna kill you.
'Cause my true father taught me otherwise.
translation.es: Porque mi verdadero padre me enseñó otra cosa.

translation.en: You can't leave me like this!
You can't leave me here alone!
[Lil Pete] Dear Mama, so much has changed since my last letter.
translation.es: Querida mamá: Mucho ha cambiado desde mi última carta.

translation.en: I scarcely know where to begin.
First off, it turns out our daddy is a bad, bad man,
translation.es: En primer lugar, resulta que papá es un hombre muy malo,

translation.en: and he got thrown in jail.
But it's okay, 'cause Screaming Eagle, the Indian chief who raised Tommy,
translation.es: Pero no importa, porque Águila de Trueno, el jefe indígena que crio a Tommy,

translation.en: said he'd be all our dads, too.
translation.es: dijo que él sería un padre para todos.

translation.en: I really like it here in this village.
Our new brothers and sisters love to have fun
translation.es: A nuestros nuevos hermanos les encanta divertirse

translation.en: and have been so nice to all of us.
translation.es: y han sido adorables con nosotros.

translation.en: These white guys cannot dance.
translation.es: Estos hombres blancos no saben bailar.

translation.en: [Lil Pete] Danny don't drink whiskey no more.
[Lil Pete] And Ramon and Herm are trying to learn Indian ways.
translation.es: Ramón y Herm están aprendiendo costumbres indígenas.

translation.en: [Lil Pete] Oh, and big news...
translation.es: Y te tengo una gran noticia...

translation.en: I finally have a girlfriend,
and she's much prettier than a canty-loupe.
translation.es: y es mucho más bonita que un melón.

translation.en: Come on, you two! You're missing all the fun.
translation.es: ¡Vamos, ustedes dos! Se pierden la diversión.

translation.en: Anyways, Mama, thanks for raising me.
Your loving son, Lil Pete,
translation.es: Tu hijo que te quiere, Pequeño Pete,

translation.en: proud member of the Ridiculous 6.
translation.es: orgulloso miembro de Los Ridículos seis.

translation.en: [Abner] Before you go...
Two, four, six, eight.
Who do we appreciate?
The Stockburns! The Stockburns!
